variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: IFI1
variable.description: Before we get started could you please tell me what was your relationship to the deceased? (Respondent was deceased's)

variable.name: IFI2
variable.description: First, think back to about one month before (________) died. At that time, was he/she sick or ill, with his/her activities limited, or was he/she normally active for the most part?

variable.name: IFI3
variable.description: Was (________) being cared for at a nursing home, or at another place at the time of death?

variable.name: IFI4A
variable.description: Could you tell me the name and location of the nursing home?

variable.name: IFI5
variable.description: Was ( ) hospitalized within the three months prior to death?

variable.name: IFI6A
variable.description: What was the reason for hospitalization? Heart attack or chest pain

variable.name: IFI6B
variable.description: What was the reason for hospitalization? Heart surgery, such as bypass surgery or angioplasty

variable.name: IFI6C
variable.description: What was the reason for hospitalization? Stroke

variable.name: IFI6D
variable.description: What was the reason for hospitalization? Other

variable.name: IFI8A
variable.description: Could you tell me the name and location of the hospital?

variable.name: IFI9
variable.description: Was ( ) seen by a physician anytime in the last three months prior to death?

variable.name: IFI10A
variable.description: Could you tell me the name and address of this physician?

variable.name: IFI11A
variable.description: Could you tell me the name and address of ( )'s usual physician?

variable.name: IFI12
variable.description: In the three months prior to ( ) 's final illness, had he/she ever had pains in the chest from heart disease, for example angina pectoris?

variable.name: IFI13
variable.description: Did ( ) take nitroglycerin for this pain?

variable.name: IFI14
variable.description: Did a doctor say that ( ) had a heart attack within the three months prior to his/her final illness?

variable.name: IFI15
variable.description: Was ( ) hospitalized for a heart attack?

variable.name: IFI16
variable.description: Were you present when ( ) died?

variable.name: IFI17
variable.description: How long after ( ) was last known to be alive was He/she found dead? {Enter the shortest interval known to be true}

variable.name: IFI18
variable.description: Where was (_) When he/she died?
variable.value: On a bus or public transportation

variable.name: IFI19
variable.description: Did ( ) experience pain or discomfort in his/her chest, left arm, or shoulder or jaw either just before death or within 3 days (72 hours) of death?

variable.name: IFI20
variable.description: Did ( )'s last episode of pain or discomfort specifically involve the chest?

variable.name: IFI21
variable.description: Did he/she take nitroglycerin because of this last episode of pain or discomfort?

variable.name: IFI22
variable.description: How long was it from the beginning of ( )'s last episode of pain or discomfort to the time he/she stopped breathing on his/her own? {Circle the shortest interval known to be true}

variable.name: IFI23A
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Shortness of breath

variable.name: IFI23B
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Dizziness

variable.name: IFI23C
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Palpitations (pounding in the chest)

variable.name: IFI23D
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Marked or increased fatigue, tiredness, or weakness

variable.name: IFI23E
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Headache

variable.name: IFI23F
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Sweating

variable.name: IFI23G
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Paralysis

variable.name: IFI23H
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Loss of speech

variable.name: IFI23I
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Attack of indigestion or nausea or vomiting

variable.name: IFI23J
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before ( ) died, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Other

variable.name: IFI24
variable.description: Was ( ) taken to a hospital just prior to dying?

variable.name: IFI25A
variable.description: Could you tell me the name and location of the hospital the patient was taken to at the time of death?

variable.name: IFI26
variable.description: Is there someone else whom we could contact, who might know more about the circumstances surrounding ( )'s death or his/her usual state of health?

variable.name: IFI27A
variable.description: Could you tell me the name, address, and telephone number of this person?

variable.name: IFI28
variable.description: How was he/she related to the deceased?

variable.name: IFI30
variable.description: Code number of the person conducting the interview:

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: IFI7FUT
variable.description: What was the approximate date of the hospital admission?

variable.name: IFI29FUT
variable.description: Date of interview:

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
